info.name: openSUSE.org Dark
info.description:
Darken many openSUSE sites:
www, download, repos, software, build, doc, lists, news, planet, lizards, bugzilla, forums, features, shop.
info.additionalInfo:
2017-11-21. Added some support for forums.o.o.
2017-11-24. Improved forums.o.o. Added features.o.o. Some fixes in build.o.o and lists.o.o.
2017-12-01. Completed posting to forums.o.o. Minor fixes all around.
2018-03-09. Update software.o.o.
2018-06-14. Fix search results in bugzilla and lists.
2018-09-13. Added shop.o.o. Some small fixes.
2018-11-08. A couple of fixes in wiki.
2018-12-06. More wiki fixes.
2018-12-23. Fix some regressions in build.
2019-02-21. Some fixes mostly in planet. and lizards. Added news.o.o.
2019-06-16. Reorganized the sites. Fixes in lizards etc.
2019-07-30. Update for the new build.o.o. site.
